name: TAVUTI
description:
Jumping, adventure game to explore the island! TAVUTI!

"TAVUTI", the only human in the village of COCOSI, a coconut tribe that worships the whale god.
The power of the Whale God has blessed the island and the COCOSI tribe.
Mysterious creatures coveting the power of the Whale God attacked the COCOSI tribe and kidnapped the power of the Whale God and the COCOSI tribe.
Our hero, TAVUTI, ventured deep into the forest to rescue the stolen power of the Whale God and the kidnapped COCOSI.

[in a beautiful forest]
Together with TAVUTI, you can see the beautiful forest scenery.
See strange creatures and beautiful plants.

[Jump and move using the terrain]
Jump or throw stones to create a path through the forest!
Hints to blaze a trail are all around you!

[Rescue the kidnapped COCOSI!]
COCOSIs have been kidnapped by a mysterious creature and are hidden in the forest!
Explore the forest and rescue the kidnapped COCOSIs.

[Battle the boss using the terrain].
Battle the boss by dodging his attacks and throwing berries at him.
Regain the power of the Whale God and return to the village!
